BreadcrumbDescription: Battle rages in Caldeum between the forces of Knights Penitent and demons unleashed on Sanctuary by Lilith. We must assist Prava to push through demon-infested streets towards Gates of Hell located beneath Imperial Palace.
Callback208Header: Defeat the demons attacking from the rooftops
Callback85Header: Help defend your allies against the demons
Name: The Scouring of Caldeum
Phase100Description: To increase our chances against ruthless demonic horde we must join Prava and her Knights Penitent and fight our way through the city to reach Caldeum palace.
